column5: Thinking of picking one up, anyone try one of these out yet? They look sleek fairly small and will transmit through wifi as well.  http://fish.shimano.com/publish/content/global_fish/en/us/index/products/1.html

well bud, I'm very sure Shimano did not step into the camera manufacturing world.  as such, it might be better to find out who made the camera, and buy from that manufacturer.  likely save the ridiculous shimano markups they are famous for.
There are a few reviews, but it seems more oriented towards the cycling world then that fishing world.
I've got a chance at a good deal on one which is why I'm considering it.
http://shop.gopro.com/cameras/hero/CHDHA-301.html  Probably has more accessories and is cheaper.... this is what I am looking at.  Burt

That's the nice thing with the Shimano camera is it will fit all the gopro mounts too, I've seen one sample video using the camera and the picture and sound are great but I was just hoping to see if anyone on here owned one. If I end up grabbing one I'll be sure to post.
